name: Ultimate Trio
description:
This is the Ultimate Trio Where Gaster, Jevil, and Sans Have to team up to defeat the human and stop the genocide.Gaster had to open the portals of Deltarune and a different Undertale universe so he can tell Sans and Jevil something they never knew before.They all decide to meet the human after all the genocide and vowed that the human would pay for every murder and every route they did.

PRESS A TO HEAL AND YOU HAVE 8 HEALING ITEMS.HOLD 2 FOR MOUSE AND HOLD 1 FOR ARROW KEYS.ORANGE YOU MOVE THROUGH AND BLUE STAND STILL.FOR MOUSE HOLD CLICK WHILE YOU ARE TOUCHING ORANGE AND DONT HOLD CLICK WHILE TOUCHING BLUE.YOU SHOULD KNOW UNDERTALE CONTROLS.CHECK TOBY FOX CREATOR OF UNDERTALE AND DALTARUNE AND THE MAKER OF MEGALOVANIA AND THE WORLDS REVOLVING.
